runBare() - Method in class org.apache.ace.it.IntegrationTestBase
Overridden to ensure that our IntegrationTestBase.tearDown() method is always called, even when IntegrationTestBase.setUp() fails with an exception (by default, JUnit does not call this method when the set up fails).
